NHIC
ค้นหา พอดคาสต์ We are an international, protestant, evangelical, charismatic, non-denominational church. Our senior pastors are Ps. Varun and Da Laohaprasit, who are devoting their time and lives to reaching out to local communities and internationally.

เกี่ยวกับ About the developer and the NHIC app
แสดงความขอบคุณ //Acknowledgements The people who have made this app possible through their support
นโยบาย //Policy
Apps4Christ is a development team aimed at creating apps for church communities. As software engineers by trade, they hope to use their skills for the glory of God\'s kingdom! The NHIC App was birthed when the Ohana caregroups started their weekly sermon listening. While it was much easier for iTunes users to get the podcasts, the rest of us had to rely on dropbox. Uploading and downloading the sermons proved to be a complicated process and a new way of doing things was needed. The NHIC App started off as a simple podcast application but slowly morphed into a fully featured app. As it is an ongoing project, please feel free to report bugs by emailing nhicdev@gmail.com. Please include your phone model in the report.
NHIC รุ่น แอพพลิเคชัน
Special thanks to the following people who let me try untested software on their phones. Thank you for all the initial bug reports, contributions, and encouragement. To the NHIC staff, thank you for all your encouragement and support in to making this a reality.
